properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the FindChangeOuterGlowSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

properties.name: applied
properties.description: If true, the outer glow effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: blendMode
properties.description: The blending mode for the outer glow effect. Can return: BlendMode enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: The opacity of the outer glow (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: noise
properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) of noise applied to the outer glow. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: effectColor
properties.description: The color applied to the outer glow, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), or an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: technique
properties.description: The technique applied to the outer glow. Can return: GlowTechnique enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: spread
properties.description: The amount of spread (as a percentage of the outer glow size). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the outer glow. Can return: Unit (0 - 144 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeOuterGlowSetting.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
